column2: Average Class Size and Class Size Distribution (Elementary)\r2016-172016-172016-172016-172017-182017-182017-182017-182018-192018-192018-192018-19\rAverage# of# of# ofAverage# of# of# ofAverage# of# of# of\rGrade\rClassClasses*Classes*Classes*ClassClasses*Classes*Classes*ClassClasses*Classes*Classes*\rLevel\rSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSizeSize\r1-2021-3233+1-2021-3233+1-2021-3233+\rK\r2113194243\r\r1\r191822181918\r\r2\r2515201051815\r\r3\r1815211521510\r\r4\r2312211172318\r\r5\r251826122712\r\r6\r1710426121512\r\rOther**\r\r*Numbe r of classes indicates how many classes fall into each size category (a range of total students per class).\r** “Other” category is for multi-grade level classes.\r\r\rProfessional Development provided for Teachers\r\rMeasure2017-182018-192019-20\rNumber of school days dedicated to Staff Development and Continuous Improvement101010\r\rBased on the analysis of CAASPP data as well as local assessments the district continues to deliver research based Developmental Reading Assessment\r(DRA) as well as a guided reading program intended to differentiate instruction and meet the needs of each individual student
